title: Data-Driven Technology-Integrated Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Basic Smartphone Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing mathematical problem-solving skills using mobile devices in restricted technological environments. Requires tailored design considering learners' digital self-efficacy and engagement differences.

learning_goals: Learners can design math problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy using data mining-based analysis
Learners can improve their digital technology efficacy in mobile environments by over 30% and effectively apply it to math learning
Learners can identify at least three patterns of their engagement in technology-integrated learning processes through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
